And the six-time Emmy nominee has her work cut out for her, as she's co-writing the long-awaited Legally Blonde 3 film.
She said it's … [+4030 chars]

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Happy Mondays star Bez launches YouTube fitness classes after getting 'seriously unfit' in lockdown - Sky News
articles.description: The famed maraca-shaking dancer hopes to motivate others to stay healthy.
